attributes.action: BBC to provide dedicated education channels in the event of school closures
attributes.additional_details: With possibilities of months of school closure, parents will be generally under prepared in delivering sustained educational stimuli/activities for their children. The net effect on students lives could potentially be very damaging if they were to lose quality educational experiences over weeks if not months
attributes.background: In the event that schools are closed because of the corona virus, that the BBC offer educational programmes on TV to assist parents in continuing their child's education at home.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the BBC. 

Since you started your petition, the BBC has announced a new range of support during the coronavirus pandemic. You can read about some of it here:

https://www.bbc.co.uk/mediacentre/latestnews/2020/bbc-keeping-nation-informed-educated-entertained
